page.title: 02HALLATON EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The working population of Hallaton is very diverse, but it still forms to a large extent a rural community. There are 8 farmers living in the village as well as 6 farm workers. The garage owners and their helpers and the pubs provide work within the village, and a painter and builder work locally. Some people are employed in cleaning and gardening, and there are large numbers living and working at Torch House and Hallaton Manor. There are also the commuters and their families - four directors of private companies, three barristers as well as other professio- nal people working in Leicester,Market Harborough and even London. Hallaton is not the balanced agricultural community it once was: fewer jobs in agriculture and insufficient cheap housing make more young people seek work elsewhere.
